紫色：/scoreboard players add @e[type=Arrow] FlyForNoG 1

绿色：/execute @e[type=Arrow,score_FlyForNoG_min=199] ~ ~ ~  /summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0}

黄色：/kill @e[type=Arrow,score_FlyTimeForNoG_min=100]

红色：/scoreboard players set @a FlyingTForNoG 0



 点缀：
粒子效果：
/execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ /particle flame ~ ~ ~ 0.1 0.1 0.1 1 10
/execute @e[type=Arrow] ~ ~ ~ /particle fireworksSpark ~ ~ ~ 0.1 0.1 0.1 0.4 10


1.10平射
增加一个循环命令方块： /entitydata @e[type=Arrow] {NoGravity:1}
